trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory"></xref> when general connectivity errors are encountered.
trans-unit.target: 이 예외가 throw 되는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory"> </xref> 일반적인 연결 오류가 발생 한 경우.

trans-unit.source: This exception is the base class for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException>.
trans-unit.target: 이 예외는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceLockException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException> 에 대 한 기본 클래스

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceException"></xref> class.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외에 대 한 이유를 설명 하는 오류 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceException"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> throw 되는 예외에 대 한 직렬화 된 개체 데이터를 보유 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>소스 또는 대상에 대 한 컨텍스트 정보를 포함 하는.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceException"></xref> class.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외에 대 한 이유를 설명 하는 오류 메시지입니다.
